label: A
content: Dogs match their behavior with kids as much as with adults.

label: B
content: Kids and adults alike find in dogs a source of attachment.

label: C
content: Kids' attitude to dogs is influenced by adults.

label: D
content: Dogs can help kids in many ways.

label: A
content: Dogs pay much attention to the kids they live with.

label: B
content: Dogs view both adults and kids as social companions.

label: C
content: Kids differ from adults in their behavior towards dogs.

label: D
content: Kids need to be aware of the risks in playing with dogs.
